name: Rusty Sword
description: A worn and battered sword with a chipped edge.

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of worn leather armor with some patches and tears.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A small vial filled with a glowing red liquid that restores health.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A rolled up parchment with magical incantations that unleash a blast of fire.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A sleek dagger with a sharp silver blade that glimmers in the light.

name: Elven Bow
description: A finely crafted bow made of polished wood and elven silver.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A magical cloak that makes the wearer invisible for a short time.

name: Giant's Club
description: A massive wooden club that was once wielded by a giant.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A ring that provides some measure of protection against attacks.

name: Helmet of Night Vision
description: A helmet with magical lenses that allow the wearer to see in the dark.

name: Tome of Knowledge
description: A thick leather-bound book filled with arcane knowledge and spells.

name: Frost Giant's Axe
description: A massive axe with a blade of ice that freezes its targets.

name: Staff of Lightning
description: A gnarled wooden staff that crackles with lightning bolts.

name: Golden Chalice
description: A beautiful golden chalice encrusted with precious gems.

name: Crystal Ball
description: A mystical crystal ball that can reveal secrets and visions.

name: Stone Chair
description: A heavy stone chair with a worn cushion.

name: Wooden Table
description: A sturdy wooden table with a few scratches and stains.

name: Bronze Statue
description: A small bronze statue of a mythical creature with intricate details.

name: Tapestry
description: A large tapestry depicting a scene from a forgotten legend.

name: Iron Torch Holder
description: A sturdy iron holder with a torch that still burns brightly.

name: Wooden Chest
description: A wooden chest with a rusty lock and a few scratches.

name: Stone Column
description: A massive stone column that supports the ceiling of the dungeon.

name: Iron Grate
description: An iron grate that covers a pit or a hole in the ground.

name: Wooden Stool
description: A small wooden stool with a cushion made of woven fibers.

name: Copper Goblet
description: A copper goblet with intricate engravings and a few dents.
